appearances.sql_template: {property} NOT IN (SELECT {property__1} FROM {property__0__original_view} WHERE {property__1} IS NOT NULL GROUP BY {property__1} HAVING count(*) > {max})
appearances.sql_template_remote: {__relation__remote_property} IN (SELECT {__relation__local_property__1} FROM {property__0__original_view} WHERE {property__1} NOT IN (SELECT {property__1} FROM {property__0__original_view} WHERE {property__1} IS NOT NULL GROUP BY {property__1} HAVING count(*) > {max}))
